org.apache.archiva.repository

Class BasicRemoteRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRepository
      • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRemoteRepository
        • org.apache.archiva.repository.BasicRemoteRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableRemoteRepository, EditableRepository, RemoteRepository, Repository, RepositoryEventHandler, RepositoryEventListener

    public class BasicRemoteRepository
extends AbstractRemoteRepository
    Just a helper class, mainly used for unit tests.
